description: Gets the blueprint configuration in Amazon DataZone.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain where this blueprint exists.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when this blueprint was created.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain where this blueprint exists.

nested_items.name: enabledRegions
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services regions in which this blueprint is enabled.

nested_items.name: manageAccessRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the manage access role with which this blueprint is created.

nested_items.name: provisioningConfigurations
nested_items.description: The provisioning configuration of a blueprint.

nested_items.name: lakeFormationConfiguration
nested_items.description: The Lake Formation configuration of the Data Lake blueprint.

nested_items.name: locationRegistrationExcludeS3Locations
nested_items.description: Specifies certain Amazon S3 locations if you do not want Amazon DataZone to automatically register them in hybrid mode.

nested_items.name: locationRegistrationRole
nested_items.description: The role that is used to manage read/write access to the chosen Amazon S3 bucket(s) for Data Lake using Amazon Web Services Lake Formation hybrid access mode.

nested_items.name: provisioningRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the provisioning role with which this blueprint is created.

nested_items.name: regionalParameters
nested_items.description: The regional parameters of the blueprint.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when this blueprint was upated.
